review: Foremost thing - Dr.Hari is an interventional cardiologist and the most friendly doctor I've ever met. Way back in 2013, when my mother, aged 70, was rushed to Apollo, Greams Road, Chennai, to our good fortune, my mother was put in the hands of Dr. Hari.
